title: Excludes certain animals from the definition of "wildlife"
summary: Excludes dogs, cats and any other domesticated animals from the definition of "wildlife"; defines the term feral dog or cat.
fulltext:
S T A T E   O F   N E W   Y O R K
       ________________________________________________________________________

                                         3593

                              2011-2012 Regular Sessions

                                 I N  A S S E M B L Y

                                   January 26, 2011
                                      ___________

       Introduced  by  M.  of  A.  GLICK,  COLTON,  GALEF, CUSICK, O'DONNELL --
         Multi-Sponsored by -- M. of A. COOK, McENENY, MILLMAN, NOLAN, PHEFFER,
         TOWNS, WEINSTEIN -- read once and referred to the Committee  on  Envi-
         ronmental Conservation

       AN  ACT  to  amend  the  environmental  conservation law, in relation to
         excluding certain animals from the definition of wildlife

         THE PEOPLE OF THE STATE OF NEW YORK, REPRESENTED IN SENATE AND  ASSEM-
       BLY, DO ENACT AS FOLLOWS:

    1    Section  1.  Paragraph  a  of  subdivision 6 of section 11-0103 of the
    2  environmental conservation law, as amended by chapter 777 of the laws of
    3  1976, is amended to read as follows:
    4    a. "Wildlife" means wild game and all other animal life existing in  a
    5  wild state, except fish, shellfish and crustacea.  NO DOG OR CAT WHETHER
    6  DOMESTICATED  OR  FERAL, OR ANY OTHER DOMESTICATED ANIMAL NORMALLY MAIN-
    7  TAINED IN OR NEAR THE HOUSEHOLD OF THE PERSON OR  OWNER  WHO  CARES  FOR
    8  SUCH  OTHER DOMESTICATED ANIMAL SHALL BE CONSIDERED WILDLIFE PURSUANT TO
    9  THIS PARAGRAPH. A FERAL CAT OR DOG SHALL MEAN ANY  DOMESTICATED  CAT  OR
   10  DOG  THAT IS BORN IN THE WILD AND IS NOT SOCIALIZED, IS THE OFFSPRING OF
   11  A DOMESTICATED CAT OR DOG AND IS NOT SOCIALIZED, OR IS A FORMERLY  OWNED
   12  DOMESTICATED CAT OR DOG THAT HAS BEEN ABANDONED AND IS NO LONGER SOCIAL-
   13  IZED.
   14    S 2. This act shall take effect immediately.




        EXPLANATION--Matter in ITALICS (underscored) is new; matter in brackets
                             [ ] is old law to be omitted.
                                                                  LBD05945-01-1
actClause: AN ACT to amend the environmental conservation law, in relation to excluding certain animals from the definition of wildlife
